ElementFields.Name: PhoenixConnect
ElementFields.Description:
tilia Phoenix configurator provides a comprehensive interface to the powerful Phoenix Imposition AI tools for creating cost-optimized, print-ready layouts and generating outputs for printing, cutting, and reporting.
With several dynamic properties controlling imposition behavior, a single tilia Phoenix flow element can adapt to a wide range of different work types, press, and post-press constraints, eliminating the need to manually create hundreds of templates for every scenario.
Concurrency is supported and multiple instances can be run within a single flow or across flows. Build 6.0
ElementFields.AppDiscovery: tilia Phoenix Connect requires Phoenix 7.0 or above to be running on the same computer as Switch server on on a network accessible computer in "Remote" location mode. Additionally, the Switch Connector needs to be started in Phoenix from the Automate panel.
ElementFields.Connections: Any number of outgoing connections can be defined to generate plan output as a Phoenix Job, imposed PDF, imposed JDF, XML/PDF report, or PDF die layout. Additionally, input jobs can be copied to outgoing connections on error, success, or always.

PhoenixJobId.DetailedInfo: Optional ID to use for the Phoenix project during plan and export; If not defined a unique ID will be generated automatically based on Prefix of incoming Switch job. This ID is also used as the file/folder name for output data
PhoenixJobId.Tooltip: ID of Phoenix project to create for planning and export; If not defined a unique ID will be generated automatically based on Prefix of incoming Switch job

Host.DetailedInfo: Location of Phoenix instance this configurator will be connecting to: Local or Remote. For Remote case you will need to specify the hostname of the computer Phoenix is running on.
Host.Tooltip: Location of Phoenix instance this configurator will be connecting to: Local or Remote. For Remote case you will need to specify the hostname of the computer Phoenix is running on.

Hostname.DetailedInfo: Hostname or IP address of Phoenix this Configurator is connecting to. If not specified the Configurator will assume Phoenix is running on the same computer as Switch.
Hostname.Tooltip: Hostname or IP address of Phoenix this Configurator is connecting to. If not specified the Configurator will assume Phoenix is running on the same computer as Switch.

FileInputMode.DetailedInfo: Whether to upload jobs from input folder to Phoenix in Upload mode or have Phoenix access the files in the input folder directly via network share in Network share mode
FileInputMode.Tooltip: Whether to upload jobs from input folder to Phoenix in Upload mode or have Phoenix access the files in the input folder directly via network share in Network share mode

InputSharePath.DetailedInfo: The full path of the input folder as it is accessed from the remote machine where Phoenix is running. For example, if the input folder is a network share, this property should define the full network share path to this input folder so Phoenix can access the files.
InputSharePath.Tooltip: The full path of the input folder as it is accessed from the remote machine where Phoenix is running. For example, if the input folder is a network share, this property should define the full network share path to this input folder so Phoenix can access the files.

Port.DetailedInfo: TCP Port number Phoenix Switch Connector is listening on. The default port used by Phoenix is 8022.
Port.Tooltip: TCP Port number Phoenix Switch Connector is listening on.

Presses.DetailedInfo:
Optional list of things (i.e. devices) from the Things library in Phoenix to include during Planning. When no things are specified, all things in your Things library are used.
To query the current Things library in Phoenix use the Select many from library option.
Presses.Tooltip: Optional list of things in Phoenix to include during Planning. When no things are specified, all things in your Things library are used.

Sheets.DetailedInfo: Whether to use all available sheets for the given product stocks and presses during planning or limit sheets used to a specific list.
Sheets.Tooltip: Whether to use all available sheets for the given product stocks and presses during planning or limit sheets used to a specific list

SelectedSheets.DetailedInfo:
List of selected sheets to restrict planning to.
Each sheet name must have the following format: STOCK_NAME/GRADE_NAME/SHEET_NAME
For example, "PVC/224 gsm/501 x 365mm Long"
SelectedSheets.Tooltip:
List of selected sheets to restrict planning to.
Each sheet name must have the following format: STOCK_NAME/GRADE_NAME/SHEET_NAME
For example, "PVC/224 gsm/501 x 365mm Long"

Rolls.DetailedInfo: Whether to use all available rolls for the given product stocks and presses during planning or limit rolls used to a specific list.
Rolls.Tooltip: Whether to use all available rolls for the given product stocks and presses during planning or limit rolls used to a specific list

SelectedRolls.DetailedInfo:
List of selected rolls to restrict planning to.
Each roll name must have the following format: STOCK_NAME/GRADE_NAME/ROLL_NAME
For example, "PVC/224 gsm/700mm"
SelectedRolls.Tooltip:
List of selected rolls to restrict planning to.
Each roll name must have the following format: STOCK_NAME/GRADE_NAME/ROLL_NAME
For example, "PVC/224 gsm/700mm"

Templates.DetailedInfo:
Optional list of templates in Phoenix Templates library to include during Planning when your ganging profile includes the Templates strategy. When no templates are selected, all templates in your library are used.
To query the current Templates library in Phoenix use the Select many from library option.
Templates.Tooltip: Optional list of templates in Phoenix Templates library to include during Planning when your ganging profile includes the Templates strategy. When no templates are selected, all templates in your library are used.

GangingProfile.DetailedInfo: Optional Imposition AI profile to use during planning. When not specified the 'Default' profile is used.
GangingProfile.Tooltip: Optional Imposition AI profile to use during planning

StopAfter.DetailedInfo: Number of minutes to let the Plan tool find optimal layouts for the current set of orders. Note: Switch has a limit on the time allowed during processing. You may need to increase this limit in the Switch User preferences to allow Plan to run for longer time periods.
StopAfter.Tooltip: Number of minutes to let the Plan tool find optimal layouts for the current set of orders

ConcurrencyTimeout.DetailedInfo: Maximum number of minutes to attempt to connect o Phoenix when maximum number of allowed concurrent requests has been reached. Value must be 1 or greater.
ConcurrencyTimeout.Tooltip: Maximum number of minutes to attempt to connect o Phoenix when maximum number of allowed concurrent requests has been reached. Value must be 1 or greater.

ProductInputMode.DetailedInfo:
Input mode to use for this configurator.
In "Direct" mode, incoming artwork files are collected until a trigger condition is reached at which point Plan is started.
In "CSV Import" mode a single CSV file with all product order information is expected and will start Plan immediately.
In "Phoenix Job" mode a single Phoenix job file (PHX) is imported. You have the option to run plan or directly export the job through the outgoing connections.
NOTE: If "Phoenix Job" mode is being used with Phoenix running remotely (Host -> Remote), then Phoenix 6.1.1 or above is required. When running locally, any version at or above Phoenix 6.0 will work.

PlanNProducts.DetailedInfo: The total number of incoming job files needed before starting a plan; a value of 0 means this option is disabled
PlanNProducts.Tooltip: The total number of incoming job files needed before starting a plan; a value of 0 means this option is disabled

PlanNMinutes.DetailedInfo: Start planning current set of products N minutes after first product arrived regardless of whether required number of products has been reached; a value of 0 means this option is disabled
PlanNMinutes.Tooltip: Start planning current set of products N minutes after first product arrived regardless of whether required number of products has been reached; a value of 0 means this option is disabled

PlanCondition.DetailedInfo:
Plan is started whenever this condition is true even if the required number of products have not arrived.
This condition is re-evaluated for each new job in the context of that job.
A value of None means this option is disabled.
PlanCondition.Tooltip: Plan is started whenever this condition is true even if the required number of products have not arrived. This condition is re-evaluated for each new job in the context of that job. A value of None means this option is disabled

PlanIdentifier.DetailedInfo:
A string value evaluated in the context of each incoming job that determines which jobs belong together. If not set, all incoming jobs are handled together. If set, plans will include only jobs with the same Plan Identifier and the Plan N Files property will also count only other jobs with matching Plan Identifier values.
A value of None means this option is disabled.
PlanIdentifier.Tooltip:
A string value evaluated in the context of each incoming job that determines which jobs belong together. If not set, all incoming jobs are handled together. If set, plans will include only jobs with the same Plan Identifier and the Plan N Files property will also count only other jobs with matching Plan Identifier values.
A value of None means this option is disabled.

FileSortMethod.DetailedInfo:
The order in which to sort products within jobs based on the incoming file name.
Available options are Default, Name Ascending and Name Descending
FileSortMethod.Tooltip:
The order in which to sort products within jobs based on the incoming file name.
Available options are Default, Name Ascending and Name Descending

ProductName.DetailedInfo: Name of the product in Phoenix
ProductName.Tooltip: Name of the product in Phoenix

ProductStock.DetailedInfo:
Stock material of product. Stock can be entered manually, by variable/script, or by selecting a stock in the current Stock Library in Phoenix.
When plans include products with different stocks, Phoenix will ensure products are placed on sheets with matching stocks and that products with different stocks are not mixed in the same layout.
ProductStock.SelectFromLibMes: Select stock from Phoenix Stock library

StockGrade.DetailedInfo: Optional grade of product stock. When not defined, the first grade for the given stock is used.
StockGrade.Tooltip: Optional grade of product stock. When not defined, the first grade for the given stock is used.

ProductGrain.DetailedInfo: Grain direction requirement of this product
ProductGrain.Tooltip: Grain direction requirement of this product

ProductOrdered.DetailedInfo: Number of orders needed to be fulfilled for this product

ProductMinOverruns.DetailedInfo:
Minimum overrun percentage allowed above or below ordered amount. When not specified, minimum overrun defaults to 0%.
Percent sign (%) is optional and negative percentages are allowed (e.g. -10%)
ProductMinOverruns.Tooltip: Minimum overrun percentage allowed above or below ordered amount; Percent sign (%) is optional and negative percentages are allowed (e.g. -10%)

ProductMaxOverruns.DetailedInfo:
Maximum overrun percentage allowed above ordered amount. When not specified, maximum overrun defaults to 100%.
Percent sign (%) is optional and only positive values are allowed.
ProductMaxOverruns.Tooltip: Maximum overrun percentage allowed on ordered amount; Percent sign (%) is optional

ProductType.DetailedInfo: Type of product to create: Flat, Tiled, Bound, or Folded.
ProductType.Tooltip: Type of product to create: Flat, Tiled, Bound, or Folded

ProductDieshape.DetailedInfo: Type of die design used to define the die line shape of product. Default is Line Type Mappings where artwork spot colors and/or PDf layers specified in Phoenix define the various die line types.
ProductDieshape.Type: enum:Tool Type Mappings;Die Design Library;CAD;Artwork TrimBox;Custom Size;Artwork Inks;Artwork Layers

DieshapeCadFile.DetailedInfo: CAD file containing 1-up die of product when 'CAD' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeCadFile.Tooltip: CAD file containing 1-up die of product

DieshapeCadDesign.DetailedInfo:
Optional name of 1-up CAD design in CAD file when 'CAD' dieshape type is selected.
If not speficied the first 1-up die defined in the CAD file is used.
DieshapeCadDesign.Tooltip: Optional name of 1-up CAD design in CAD file; If not speficied the first 1-up die defined in the CAD file is used

DieshapeCutInk.DetailedInfo:
Spot color name in the PDF to use for product cut lines.
This field is required when 'Artwork Inks' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeCutInk.Tooltip: Spot color name in the PDF to use for product cut lines

DieshapeCreaseInk.DetailedInfo: Optional spot color name in the PDF to use for product crease lines when 'Artwork Inks' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeCreaseInk.Tooltip: Spot color name in the PDF to use for product crease lines

DieshapeBleedInk.DetailedInfo: Optional spot color name in the PDF to use for product bleed mask when 'Artwork Inks' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeBleedInk.Tooltip: Spot color name in the PDF to use for product content bleed mask

DieshapeCutLayer.DetailedInfo:
Layer name in the PDF to use for product cut lines.
This field is required when 'Artwork Layers' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeCutLayer.Tooltip: Layer name in the PDF to use for product cut lines

DieshapeCreaseLayer.DetailedInfo: Optional layer name in the PDF to use for product crease lines when 'Artwork Layers' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeCreaseLayer.Tooltip: Layer name in the PDF to use for product crease lines

DieshapeBleedLayer.DetailedInfo: Optional layer name in the PDF to use for product bleed mask when 'Artwork Layers' dieshape type is selected.
DieshapeBleedLayer.Tooltip: Layer name in the PDF to use for product content bleed mask

DieshapeWidth.DetailedInfo:
Width of rectangular product when 'Custom Size' dieshape type selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 200mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
DieshapeWidth.Tooltip: Width of rectangular product; units may be specified (e.g. 200mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed

DieshapeHeight.DetailedInfo:
Height of rectangular product when 'Custom Size' dieshape type selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 200mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
DieshapeHeight.Tooltip: Height of rectangular product; units may be specified (e.g. 200mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed

DieDesignName.DetailedInfo: Full path of die design in the Die Designs Library including folders and design name separated by forward slash ('/').
DieDesignName.Tooltip: Full path of die design in the Die Designs Library including folders and design name separated by forward slash ('/').

Scaling.Dependencyvalue: Tool Type Mappings;Die Design Library;CAD;Artwork TrimBox;Artwork Inks;Artwork Layers

ScalingH.Tooltip: Horizontal Scale Factor. Must use % symbol in property value.

ScalingV.Tooltip: Vertical Scale Factor. Must use % symbol in property value.

ProductAutosnap.DetailedInfo: Artwork to product dieshape autosnap mode; used when product dieshape type is CAD or Custom Size
ProductAutosnap.Tooltip: Artwork to product dieshape autosnap mode; used when product dieshape type is CAD or Custom Size

AutosnapInk.DetailedInfo: Spot color name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning artwork to product die on the front side of the product when 'Autosnap with Ink' autosnap mode is selected.
AutosnapInk.Tooltip: Spot color name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning to product die on the front side of the product

BackAutosnapInk.DetailedInfo: Spot color name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning artwork to product die on the back side of the product when 'Autosnap with Ink' autosnap mode is selected.
BackAutosnapInk.Tooltip: Spot color name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning to product die on the back side of the product

AutosnapLayer.DetailedInfo: Layer name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning to product die on the front side of the product when 'Autosnap with Layer' mode is selected.
AutosnapLayer.Tooltip: Layer name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning to product die on the front side of the product

BackAutosnapLayer.DetailedInfo: Layer name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning to product die on the back side of the product when 'Autosnap with Layer' mode is selected.
BackAutosnapLayer.Tooltip: Layer name in the PDF to use as dieshape when aligning to product die on the back side of the product

PageHandling.DetailedInfo:
This option affects how multi-page artwork files are interpreted in direct mode.
If "One product per file" is selected, a single product is always created for each artwork file regardless of the number of pages.
If "One product per page" is selected, one single-sided product is created for each page in the artwork file.
If "One double-sided product every two pages" is selected, a product will be created for every two pages with the first page used as the front artwork and the second page used as the back artwork of the product. If the artwork file has an odd number of pages, the last page will create a single-sided product.
For example, if a 5 page PDF file comes in, this option will create 2 double-sided products and 1 single-sided product. Pages 1 and 2 will be used as the front and back of the first product respectively and pages 3 and 4 used as the front and back of the second product. Page 5 will be used as the front of the final single-sided product.
PageHandling.Tooltip: Controls whether multi-page artwork files are treated as a single product or split up into multiple products in Phoenix
PageHandling.Type: enum:One product per file;One product per page;One product per two pages

FrontToBack.DetailedInfo: Action to perform to copy or mirror artwork on the front side of the flat product to the back side.
FrontToBack.Tooltip: Action to perform to copy or mirror artwork on the front side of the flat product to the back side

ShapeHandling.DetailedInfo: Shape handling mode to use when finding closed path shapes from the dielines in the artwork. 'Multiple' mode will create a new product for each closed path shape detected in the artwork.
ShapeHandling.Tooltip: Shape handling mode to use when finding closed path shapes from the dielines in the artwork. 'Multiple' mode will create a new product for each closed path shape detected in the artwork.

ProductTemplates.DetailedInfo: Requires Phoenix 6.0 or higher. Optional list of templates to restrict this product to when ganging with templates from the Templates library. When unset, all available templates that this product shape matches will be attempted during ganging. To query the current Templates library in Phoenix use the Select many from library option.
ProductTemplates.Tooltip: Optional list of templates to restrict this product to when ganging with templates from the Templates library

TilingStart.DetailedInfo:
The corner of the artwork where the first tile is to be placed.
This property plus tile order define the exact order tiles are to be placed.
TilingStart.Tooltip:
The corner of the artwork where the first tile is to be placed.
This property plus tile order define the exact order tiles are to be placed.

TilingOrder.DetailedInfo:
Tile placement order.
This property plus start corner define the exact order tiles are to be placed.
TilingOrder.Tooltip:
Tile placement order.
This property plus start corner define the exact order tiles are to be placed.

TilingH.DetailedInfo:
Rule for splitting up artwork into tiles in the horizontal direction.
Used to divide the artwork into multiple items to be produced separately.
TilingH.Tooltip:
Rule for splitting up artwork into tiles in the horizontal direction.
Used to divide the artwork into multiple items to be produced separately.

TilingNumberH.DetailedInfo:
Number of tiles to create in the horizontal direction.
Tiles are evenly spaced across the width of the artwork.
TilingNumberH.Tooltip:
Number of tiles to create in the horizontal direction.
Tiles are evenly spaced across the width of the artwork.

TilingUniformH.DetailedInfo: When defining a fixed number of tiles, enabling this option ensures the final tile sizes are uniform in the horizontal direction regardless of gap or overlap settings. When not enabled, inner and edge tile sizes can differ because uniform tile sizes are then calculated before gap or overlap rules are applied.
TilingUniformH.Tooltip: When defining a fixed number of tiles, enabling this option ensures the final tile sizes are uniform in the horizontal direction regardless of gap or overlap settings. When not enabled, inner and edge tile sizes can differ because uniform tile sizes are then calculated before gap or overlap rules are applied.

TilingSizeH.DetailedInfo: Fixed width of tiles in horizontal direction.
TilingSizeH.Tooltip: Fixed width of tiles in horizontal direction

TilingSizesH.DetailedInfo: List of all tile widths in the horizontal direction.
TilingSizesH.Tooltip: List of all tile widths in the horizontal direction

TilingMethodH.DetailedInfo: Tiling method to use in horizontal direction in any: Gap or Overlap.
TilingMethodH.Tooltip: Tiling method to use in horizontal direction in any

TilingGapSizeH.DetailedInfo: Gap distance between tiles in the horizontal direction.
TilingGapSizeH.Tooltip: Gap distance between tiles in the horizontal direction

TilingGapExtensionH.DetailedInfo: Amount of extra artwork content beyond the tile gap edge to extend in the horizontal direction.
TilingGapExtensionH.Tooltip: Amount of extra artwork content beyond the tile gap edge to extend in the horizontal direction

TilingGapExtensionRuleH.DetailedInfo: Rule defining which horizontal direction(s) the gap is extended for each tile.
TilingGapExtensionRuleH.Tooltip: Rule defining which horizontal direction(s) the gap is extended for each tile

TilingOverlapSizeH.DetailedInfo: Distance (in points) beyond tile edge to extend the tile horizontally to create overlap.
TilingOverlapSizeH.Tooltip: Distance (in points) beyond tile edge to extend the tile horizontally to create overlap

TilingOverlapRuleH.DetailedInfo: Rule defining what horizontal edge(s) of tiles will overlap with neighboring tiles.
TilingOverlapRuleH.Tooltip: Rule defining what horizontal edge(s) of tiles will overlap with neighboring tiles

TilingOverlapNoImageH.DetailedInfo: Width (in points) of the section at the end of the overlap where no artwork content is allowed
TilingOverlapNoImageH.Tooltip: Width (in points) of the section at the end of the overlap where no artwork content is allowed

TilingV.DetailedInfo:
Rule for splitting up artwork into tiles in the vertical direction.
Used to divide the artwork into multiple items to be produced separately.
TilingV.Tooltip:
Rule for splitting up artwork into tiles in the vertical direction.
Used to divide the artwork into multiple items to be produced separately.

TilingNumberV.DetailedInfo:
Number of tiles to create in the vertical direction.
Tiles are evenly spaced across the height of the artwork.
TilingNumberV.Tooltip:
Number of tiles to create in the vertical direction.
Tiles are evenly spaced across the height of the artwork.

TilingUniformV.DetailedInfo: When defining a fixed number of tiles, enabling this option ensures the final tile sizes are uniform in the vertical direction regardless of gap or overlap settings. When not enabled, inner and edge tile sizes can differ because uniform tile sizes are then calculated before gap or overlap rules are applied.
TilingUniformV.Tooltip: When defining a fixed number of tiles, enabling this option ensures the final tile sizes are uniform in the vertical direction regardless of gap or overlap settings. When not enabled, inner and edge tile sizes can differ because uniform tile sizes are then calculated before gap or overlap rules are applied.

TilingSizeV.DetailedInfo: Fixed height of tiles in vertical direction.
TilingSizeV.Tooltip: Fixed height of tiles in vertical direction

TilingSizesV.DetailedInfo: List of all tile heights in the vertical direction.
TilingSizesV.Tooltip: List of all tile heights in the vertical direction

TilingMethodV.DetailedInfo: Tiling method to use in vertical direction if any: Gap or Overlap.
TilingMethodV.Tooltip: Tiling method to use in vertical direction if any

TilingGapSizeV.DetailedInfo: Gap distance between tiles in the vertical direction.
TilingGapSizeV.Tooltip: Gap distance between tiles in the vertical direction.

TilingGapExtensionV.DetailedInfo: Amount of extra artwork content beyond the tile gap edge to extend in the vertical direction.
TilingGapExtensionV.Tooltip: Amount of extra artwork content beyond the tile gap edge to extend in the vertical direction

TilingGapExtensionRuleV.DetailedInfo: Rule defining which vertical direction(s) the gap is extended for each tile.
TilingGapExtensionRuleV.Tooltip: Rule defining which vertical direction(s) the gap is extended for each tile

TilingOverlapSizeV.DetailedInfo: Distance (in points) beyond tile edge to extend the tile vertically to create overlap.
TilingOverlapSizeV.Tooltip: Distance (in points) beyond tile edge to extend the tile vertically to create overlap

TilingOverlapRuleV.DetailedInfo: Rule defining what vertical edge(s) of tiles will overlap with neighboring tiles.
TilingOverlapRuleV.Tooltip: Rule defining what vertical edge(s) of tiles will overlap with neighboring tiles

TilingOverlapNoImageV.DetailedInfo: Height (in points) of the section at the end of the overlap where artwork content is to be clipped
TilingOverlapNoImageV.Tooltip: Height (in points) of the section at the end of the overlap where artwork content is to be clipped

FoldingPattern.DetailedInfo: Folding pattern to use for folded work.
FoldingPattern.Tooltip: Folding pattern to use for folded work

FoldingPatterns.DetailedInfo: List of folding patterns to use for bound work.
FoldingPatterns.Tooltip: List of folding patterns to use for bound work

BindingMethod.DetailedInfo: Binding method to use for bound work.
BindingMethod.Tooltip: Binding method to use for bound work

PagesPerSection.DetailedInfo: Number of pages per section (e.g. Smyth sewn) for multi-section bound work.
PagesPerSection.Tooltip: Number of pages per section (e.g. Smyth sewn) for multi-section bound work

BindingEdge.DetailedInfo: Page binding edge for bound work.
BindingEdge.Tooltip: Page binding edge for bound work

JogEdge.DetailedInfo: Jog edge for bound work. When set, this edge must be perpendicular to the binding edge. Setting jog to Bottom for left- or right-bound work results in 'Foot to Foot' page orientation.
JogEdge.Tooltip: Jog edge for bound work. When set, this edge must be perpendicular to the binding edge. Setting jog to Bottom for left- or right-bound work results in 'Foot to Foot' page orientation.

ReadingOrder.DetailedInfo: Reading order of pages in bound work.
ReadingOrder.Tooltip: Reading order of pages in bound work

SelfCover.DetailedInfo: Whether bound part includes a cover or not.
SelfCover.Tooltip: Whether bound part includes a cover or not

SpineTrim.DetailedInfo: Spine trim amount in bound signatures.
SpineTrim.Tooltip: Spine trim amount in bound signatures

JogTrim.DetailedInfo: Jog trim amount in bound signatures.
JogTrim.Tooltip: Jog trim amount in bound signatures

FaceTrim.DetailedInfo: Face trim amount in bound signatures.
FaceTrim.Tooltip: Face trim amount in bound signatures

NonJogTrim.DetailedInfo: Non-jog trim amount in bound signatures.
NonJogTrim.Tooltip: Non-jog trim amount in bound signatures

LipType.DetailedInfo: Lip type for determining where lip gets added to bound signatures.
LipType.Tooltip: Lip type for determining where lip gets added to bound signatures

Lip.DetailedInfo: Lip amount to add to bound signatures.
Lip.Tooltip: Lip amount to add to bound signatures

NUp.DetailedInfo: Number of N-ups which can be a value of 1, 2, or 3 with 1 signifying normal non N-up repeated signatures.
NUp.Tooltip: Number of N-ups which can be a value of 1, 2, or 3 with 1 signifying normal non N-up repeated signatures

NUpGap.DetailedInfo: Gap spacing to apply between N-up repeat pages.
NUpGap.Tooltip: Gap spacing to apply between N-up repeat pages

Creep.DetailedInfo: Type of creep to apply to bound signatures.
Creep.Tooltip: Type of creep to apply to bound signatures

CreepTransition.DetailedInfo: Percentage from the inner most signatures towards the spine when to change creep direction from inward to outward when using 'Custom' creep type.
CreepTransition.Tooltip: Percentage from the inner most signatures towards the spine when to change creep direction from inward to outward when using 'Custom' creep type

CreepMethod.DetailedInfo: Creep method to use for performing creep on bound signatures.
CreepMethod.Tooltip: Creep method to use for performing creep on bound signatures

CreepCalculation.DetailedInfo: Creep calculation mode to use to determine creep amount to apply.
CreepCalculation.Tooltip: Creep calculation mode to use to determine creep amount to apply

CreepAmount.DetailedInfo: Amount of creep to apply which can be total or per-page amount based on the calculation mode.
CreepAmount.Tooltip: Amount of creep to apply which can be total or per-page amount based on the calculation mode

PageBleed.DetailedInfo: Bleed margins of individual pages in bound and folded products
PageBleed.Tooltip: Bleed margins of individual pages in bound and folded products

FrontInks.DetailedInfo: Page colors for front side of flat products or all pages of bound and folded products.
FrontInks.Tooltip: Page colors for front side of flat products or all pages of bound and folded products

BackInks.DetailedInfo: Page back colors for back side of flat products.
BackInks.Tooltip: Page back colors for back side of flat products

ProductGroup.DetailedInfo: Optional product group. When specified the Plan tool will group products with same group values together.
ProductGroup.Tooltip: Optional product group. When specified the Plan tool will group products with same group values together

ProductDueDate.DetailedInfo: Optional product due date. When specified the Plan tool will group products with same due dates together.
ProductDueDate.Tooltip: Optional product due date. When specified the Plan tool will group products with same due dates together

ProductPriority.DetailedInfo: Optional priority to assign to product from 1 to 10 with 1 being highest priority. If value of this property is set to "Default" then the default product priority in Phoenix product preferences is used.
ProductPriority.Tooltip: Optional priority to assign to product from 1 to 10 with 1 being highest priority. If value of this property is set to "Default" then the default product priority in Phoenix product preferences is used.

Marks.DetailedInfo: Optional list of marks from the Phoenix marks library to apply to the front side of this product.
Marks.Tooltip: Optional list of marks from the Phoenix marks library to apply to the front side of this product

BackMarks.DetailedInfo: Optional list of marks from the Phoenix marks library to apply to the back side of this product.
BackMarks.Tooltip: Optional list of marks from the Phoenix marks library to apply to the back side of this product

Rotation.DetailedInfo: Type of rotation this product is allowed to use during planning.
Rotation.Tooltip: Type of rotation this product is allowed to use during planning.

ProductRotations.DetailedInfo:
Allowed rotations as comma-delimited list. For example "0,90".
When specified, allowed rotation overrides the default behavior of aligning product and sheet grain directions during planning, ensuring products are only placed in the defined allowed rotation(s).
ProductRotations.Tooltip: Allowed rotations as comma-delimited list. For example "0,90"

ProductBleedType.DetailedInfo: Type of bleed mask to apply to this product's artwork. For "Margins" you can define different bleed margins for each side of the product. "Contour" creates a uniform offset path from the product shape. "None" will not apply a bleed mask.
ProductBleedType.Tooltip: Type of bleed mask to apply to this product's artwork. For "Margins" you can define different bleed margins for each side of the product. "Contour" creates a uniform offset path from the product shape. "None" will not apply a bleed mask.

ProductBleed.DetailedInfo:
Bleed offset to generate from product die shape. If not specified of "Default" then default job bleed offset is used as defined in Preferences -> Job in Phoenix.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductBleed.Tooltip: Bleed offset to generate from product die shape; If not specified default job bleed offset is used

ProductBleedTop.DetailedInfo:
Bleed offset required on top edge of product.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductBleedTop.Tooltip: Bleed offset required on top edge of product

ProductBleedBottom.DetailedInfo:
Bleed offset required on bottom edge of product.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductBleedBottom.Tooltip: Bleed offset required on bottom edge of product

ProductBleedRight.DetailedInfo:
Bleed offset required on right edge of product.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductBleedRight.Tooltip: Bleed offset required on right edge of product

ProductBleedLeft.DetailedInfo:
Bleed offset required on left edge of product.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductBleedLeft.Tooltip: Bleed offset required on left edge of product

ProductSpacingType.DetailedInfo: Product spacing type used when placing products in layouts during Plan.
ProductSpacingType.Tooltip: Product spacing type used when placing products in layouts during Plan

ProductSpacing.DetailedInfo:
Uniform spacing offset to apply to product dieshape when 'Contour' spacing type is selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductSpacing.Tooltip: Spacing offset to apply to product dieshape; units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.

ProductSpacingTop.DetailedInfo:
Spacing distance required on top edge of product when 'Margins' spacing type is selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductSpacingTop.Tooltip: Spacing distance required on top edge of product

ProductSpacingBottom.DetailedInfo:
Spacing distance required on bottom edge of product when 'Margins' spacing type is selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductSpacingBottom.Tooltip: Spacing distance required on bottom edge of product

ProductSpacingRight.DetailedInfo:
Spacing distance required on right edge of product when 'Margins' spacing type is selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductSpacingRight.Tooltip: Spacing distance required on right edge of product

ProductSpacingLeft.DetailedInfo:
Spacing distance required on left edge of product when 'Margins' spacing type is selected.
Units may be specified (e.g. 3mm) and if omitted, Phoenix default units are assumed.
ProductSpacingLeft.Tooltip: Spacing distance required on left edge of product

Offcut.DetailedInfo: Optional offcut margins to apply to the sides of product components.
Offcut.Tooltip: Optional offcut margins to apply to the sides of product components

OffcutTop.DetailedInfo: Offcut amount to add to the top edge of product component.
OffcutTop.Tooltip: Offcut amount to add to the top edge of product component

OffcutBottom.DetailedInfo: Offcut amount to add to the bottom edge of product component.
OffcutBottom.Tooltip: Offcut amount to add to the bottom edge of product component

OffcutRight.DetailedInfo: Offcut amount to add to the right edge of product component.
OffcutRight.Tooltip: Offcut amount to add to the right edge of product component

OffcutLeft.DetailedInfo: Offcut amount to add to the left edge of product component.
OffcutLeft.Tooltip: Offcut amount to add to the left edge of product component

ProductNotes.DetailedInfo: Optional notes to attach to the product notes property.

ProductDescription.DetailedInfo: Optional description to attach to the product notes property.

CustomProperties.DetailedInfo: Optional custom properties to apply to the product.
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Optional custom properties to apply to the product

CsvImportPreset.DetailedInfo:
CSV Import Preset to use while importing CSV file when 'CSV Import' input mode is used.
If not specified default Phoenix CSV Import preset is used
CsvImportPreset.Tooltip: CSV Import Preset to use while importing CSV file; if not specified default Phoenix CSV Import preset is used

CsvImportBaseFolder.DetailedInfo:
Optional base folder path used to interpret relative file paths within the CSV file when 'CSV Import' input mode is used.
If not specified, all paths are assumed to be full absolute paths.
CsvImportBaseFolder.Tooltip: Optional base folder path used to interpret relative file paths within path entries in the CSV file

RunPlan.DetailedInfo:
Whether or not to run the Plan tool on the input Phoenix job.
Set to no for jobs that have already been laid out. This can be useful in cases where an existing job has been modified and needs to be output for printing, cutting, etc.
RunPlan.Tooltip: Whether or not to run the Plan tool on the input Phoenix job. Set to no for jobs that have already been laid out.

OutgoingData.DetailedInfo: Type of data to send to this connection: Copies of original Input Jobs or Output Files that are generated by Phoenix after the Plan tool creates a plan.
OutgoingData.Tooltip: Type of data to send to this connection: Output Files are files generated by Phoenix after the Plan tool creates a plan

IncludePhoenixJob.DetailedInfo: Whether to include a saved Phoenix project file (.phx) allowing you to open the generated project in tilia Phoenix.
IncludePhoenixJob.Tooltip: Whether to include a saved Phoenix project file (.phx) allowing you to open the generated project in tilia Phoenix

IncludeImposedPdf.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate an imposed PDF of the completed plan.
IncludeImposedPdf.Tooltip: Whether to generate an imposed PDF of the completed plan

ExportPdfPreset.DetailedInfo:
Select PDF Export Preset.
Defaults to "Factory Default PDF Export" when not specified.
ExportPdfPreset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control export behavior and content of imposed PDFs; Defaults to "Factory Default PDF Export" when not specified

IncludeImposedJdf.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate an imposed JDF of the completed plan
IncludeImposedJdf.Tooltip: Whether to generate an imposed JDF of the completed plan

ExportJdfPreset.DetailedInfo:
Optional preset used to control export behavior and content of imposed JDFs.
Defaults to "Factory Default JDF Export" when not specified.
ExportJdfPreset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control export behavior and content of imposed JDFs; Defaults to "Factory Default JDF Export" when not specified

IncludePdfDie.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate PDF die layouts of the completed plan.
IncludePdfDie.Tooltip: Whether to generate PDF die layouts of the completed plan

ExportPdfDiePreset.DetailedInfo:
Optional preset used to control export behavior of PDF die layout.
Defaults to "PDF Default Preset" when not specified.
ExportPdfDiePreset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control export behavior of PDF die layout; Defaults to "PDF Default Preset" when not specified

IncludeCf2Die.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate a CF2 die layouts of the completed plan.
IncludeCf2Die.Tooltip: Whether to generate CF2 die layouts of the completed plan

ExportCf2Preset.DetailedInfo: Optional preset used to control export behavior of CF2 die layout
ExportCf2Preset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control export behavior of CF2 die layout

IncludeDxfDie.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate DXF die layouts of the completed plan.
IncludeDxfDie.Tooltip: Whether to generate DXF die layouts of the completed plan

ExportDxfPreset.DetailedInfo: Preset used to control export behavior of DXF die layout.
ExportDxfPreset.Tooltip: Preset used to control export behavior of DXF die layout

IncludeZcc.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate Zund Cut Center cutting layouts of the completed plan.
IncludeZcc.Tooltip: Whether to generate Zund Cut Center cutting layouts of the completed plan

ExportZccPreset.DetailedInfo: Preset used to control export behavior of ZCC export.
ExportZccPreset.Tooltip: Preset used to control export behavior of ZCC export

IncludeVectorSeparation.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate PDF vector separation output for the completed plan.
IncludeVectorSeparation.Tooltip: Whether to generate PDF vector separation output for the completed plan

ExportVectorPreset.DetailedInfo: Preset used to control export behavior of PDF vector separation export.
ExportVectorPreset.Tooltip: Preset used to control export behavior of PDF vector separation export

IncludeCoverSheet.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate PDF cover sheets for all layouts in the completed plan
IncludeCoverSheet.Tooltip: Whether to generate PDF cover sheets for all layouts in the completed plan

CoverSheetPreset.DetailedInfo: Preset used to control cover sheet export behavior.
CoverSheetPreset.Tooltip: Preset used to control cover sheet export behavior.

IncludeTilingReport.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate a tiling report of the completed plan when the plan involves tiled products.
IncludeTilingReport.Tooltip: Whether to generate a tiling report of the completed plan

ExportTilingReportPreset.DetailedInfo: Preset used to control content of generated tiling report.
ExportTilingReportPreset.Tooltip: Preset used to control content of generated tiling report

IncludePdfReport.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate a PDF report of the completed plan.
IncludePdfReport.Tooltip: Whether to generate a PDF report of the completed plan

ExportPdfReportPreset.DetailedInfo: Optional preset used to control content of generated PDF report; Defaults to "PDF Report Default Preset" when not specified.
ExportPdfReportPreset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control content of generated PDF report; Defaults to "PDF Report Default Preset" when not specified

IncludeXmlReport.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate a XML report of the completed plan.
IncludeXmlReport.Tooltip: Whether to generate a XML report of the completed plan

ExportXmlReportPreset.DetailedInfo: Optional preset used to control content of generated XML report; Defaults to "XML Report Default Preset" when not specified.
ExportXmlReportPreset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control content of generated XML report; Defaults to "XML Report Default Preset" when not specified

IncludeJsonReport.DetailedInfo: Whether to generate a JSON report of the completed plan.
IncludeJsonReport.Tooltip: Whether to generate a JSON report of the completed plan

ExportJsonReportPreset.DetailedInfo:
Optional preset used to control content of generated JSON report.
Defaults to "JSON Report Default Preset" when not specified.
ExportJsonReportPreset.Tooltip: Optional preset used to control content of generated JSON report; Defaults to "JSON Report Default Preset" when not specified

InputFilesMove.DetailedInfo: When to move input files along this outgoing connection: Always, on plan success only, or on errors only.
InputFilesMove.Tooltip: When to move input files along this outgoing connection

CollectJobFolder.DetailedInfo:
On Yes outgoing files are collected into a job folder and passed as a single job, otherwise files are passed along individually as separate jobs.
Note: Absolute and relative path JDF output will ignore this option and always collect files into a job folder to ensure the generated "Content" sub-folder is kept together with the JDF file(s)
CollectJobFolder.Tooltip: On Yes outgoing files are collected into a job folder and passed as a single job, otherwise files are passed along individually as separate jobs

PlanDatasetName.DetailedInfo: Name of XML report dataset that gets attached to each output file or job folder
PlanDatasetName.Tooltip: Name of XML report dataset that gets attached to each output file or job folder
